en-US.summary: Mega Family Trivia features over 200 fun, funny, and educational questions for kids of all ages, updated frequently.
examplePhrases: Alexa tell Mega Family Trivia to start a game
Alexa tell Mega Family Trivia I want to play
en-US.name: Mega Family Trivia
en-US.description: Mega Family Trivia features over 200 fun, funny, and educational questions for kids of all ages. Answer 5 trivia questions and track your score. Can you beat your family and friends? Test your trivia skills by saying 'Alexa open Mega Family Trivia'. Say, 'Alexa help' while using the skill for detailed instructions.
